price: Ԑmma wonsa nkyekyere mmͻ wo kͻn ho (anaasε hwε na woanyε pεpεε anaa εmmͻ ayεmuͻnyono), na εntene mu nso nyinaa (anaasε ma wadekyεε nyε hͻ-ne-hͻ), anhwε a watena ase anunu (wo ho) ama woho akyere wo.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā tajʿal yadaka maghlūlatan ilā ʿunuqika walā tabsuṭ'hā kulla al-basṭi fataqʿuda malūman maḥsūran
